source.name: IDPH Licensed Campgrounds
source.description: Current as of August 1, 2012.  The Illinois Department of Public Health licenses facilities that meet the definition of a campground as defined in the Campground Licensing and Recreational Act in non-home rule units of government.

datasets.name: IDPH Licensed Campgrounds
datasets.description: Current as of August 1, 2012.  The Illinois Department of Public Health licenses facilities that meet the definition of a campground as defined in the Campground Licensing and Recreational Act in non-home rule units of government.
